prodNameC: 希摩西爾第七凝固因子缺乏血漿
ingredientsDesc: lyophilized human plasma that has been artificially depleted of factor VII containing buffer and stabilizers. The residual factor VII activity is less than or equal to 1% whereas all other coagulation factors have normal leves.
